name: Margarita Chicken Quesadilla
description: Keep summer going all year long with this easy, quick, dinner-time favourite. The flavours of herbaceous, slow roasted chicken are paired with lime to give it a zing and elevate standard quesadillas. Make it extra special: add a little tequila along with the lime to the chicken. Sip on a Strawberry Margarita and give yourself a high-five for a dinner well-done!
preparation: Thinly slice pepper and onion. Place pepper, onion, and chicken in Multipurpose Steamer. Stir in seasoning. Cover and microwave on high 5–6 min, or until chicken is cooked through. Slice lime in half. Using 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in juice from 1⁄2 lime; stir to combine. Slice remaining 1⁄2 lime into wedges.

In Sauté Pan, heat 1⁄2 tbsp oil over medium-high heat. Add one tortilla to the pan; spread with 1⁄4 of the cheese and 1⁄4 of the veggie and chicken mixture. Add second tortilla on top. Cook until golden brown, 1 min per side.
Repeat with remaining tortillas. Slice tortillas into wedges and serve with lime wedges and additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Prepare quesadillas in the oven. Bake at 400° F on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner 10 min, or until cheese has melted and tortillas are starting to brown.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup veggies, your choice.

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kind—free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
